data.name: Old Roots
data.detailed_description:
Old Roots is a survival horror game, inspired in the siberian enviroment. When you are a hunter and you found something going wrong in the forest, what would you do?. Explore and find new things, or just practice shooting with your cans?
In the forest, be careful where you step, there is so many bunkers from WW2 hide inside the earth, and some of them are haunted! Maybe the ancient viking gods where not a myth, and you must be stealthy or you will end death!
data.about_the_game:
Old Roots is a survival horror game, inspired in the siberian enviroment. When you are a hunter and you found something going wrong in the forest, what would you do?. Explore and find new things, or just practice shooting with your cans?
In the forest, be careful where you step, there is so many bunkers from WW2 hide inside the earth, and some of them are haunted! Maybe the ancient viking gods where not a myth, and you must be stealthy or you will end death!
data.short_description: Old Roots: fight your fear and survive your fate. Inspired by the geography of Siberia and with inspiration from games like Doom or Hellblade, you will have to face your own fear and overcome your enemies... without losing control.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: There is some violence and graphic scenes.
